name: Eldrin Thorne
appearance: Eldrin is an elderly mage with long, unkempt gray hair and piercing blue eyes. He wears tattered robes adorned with arcane symbols, a leather satchel slung across his back, and carries a weathered staff inscribed with runic markings.

stunts.name: Arcane Insight
stunts.description: You can sense when someone is attempting to conceal knowledge or manipulate others.

stunts.name: Mystic Recall
stunts.description: If you have studied a particular subject, you can retrieve lost information from your mind's archive.

stunts.name: Elemental Willpower
stunts.description: You can use magic to bolster your defenses or resist hostile magic.

quirks: Keeps a running tally of all books he's read
fears: Discovering something too terrible to bear
desires: Uncover the secrets of an ancient civilization

backstory.origin: Born into a noble family, Eldrin's life took a dark turn after his parents' mysterious disappearance during a forbidden ritual.
backstory.formativeEvent: Haunted by visions and cryptic symbols left behind by his vanished family, Eldrin dedicated himself to studying the arcane arts in secret.
backstory.secret: Eldrin carries an ancient amulet passed down from his lineage, believed to be connected to the very power that led to his parents' fate.
backstory.summary: A once-privileged scholar now travels the forgotten realms, piecing together fragments of lost knowledge and battling those who would use dark magic for their own gain.

voice.speechPattern: Mumbles in a low, gravelly voice; often pauses to contemplate each word.
phrases: 'Tis said that the ancients knew more than we do...
'Twould be folly to cast such power without understanding.
voice.quirks: Uses arcane terms when speaking, occasionally forgetting common words.
